renderer.math

Class Mat4

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.math.Mat4

  • public class Mat4
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a number of methods for performing matrix math
    Author:
    Stephen Thompson ID: 300332215

      • createOrtho

        public static Mat4 createOrtho(float l,
                               float r,
                               float b,
                               float t,
                               float n,
                               float f)
        Returns an orthographic projection matrix. The projection matrix transforms the camera coordinates into projection coordinates, values inside the view ranging from -1 to 1.
        Parameters:
        l - - the left clipping plane
        r - - the right clipping plane
        b - - the bottom clipping plane
        t - - the top clipping plane
        n - - the near clipping plane
        f - - the far clipping plane
        Returns:
        - an orthographic projection matrix

      • createLookAt

        public static Mat4 createLookAt(Vec3 eye,
                                Vec3 target,
                                Vec3 up)
        Returns a new lookat matrix. The lookat matrix transforms the world into camera coordinates
        Parameters:
        eye - - the position of the camera
        target - - the target the camera is pointing towards
        up - - the up vector
        Returns:
        a new lookat matrix
